name: Space Guardian
description:
This is a fast-paced arcade-style casual car battle game. The levels are all randomly generated by the program and can be challenged forever.

Gameplay

  • 6 types of vehicles and 6 types of weapons are available for collection.
  • After destroying the enemies in each level, go to the next level.
  • Upgrade the attributes of the battle car as you like.
  • All over again after failure.
  • Can be played with one hand.
